author: rishabh-raturi
body:
Hello, 

This PR adds a custom .pdl file needed for the central production of a new BPH MC request.  

The KL particle has too large a lifetime to give sufficient gen efficiency. Hence, the lifetime was reduced by 0.1 factor. This is a common practice for BPH analyses. Please find below the diff between `evt_2020.pdl` and the updated file `evt_0.1KLlifetime.pdl`. 

```
117c117
< add  p Particle  K_L0                             130  4.9761100e-01  0.0000000e+00  0.0000000e+00     0     0  1.5337382e+04        130
---
> add  p Particle  K_L0                             130  4.9761100e-01  0.0000000e+00  0.0000000e+00     0     0  1.5337382e+03        130
```

No other CMSSW changes are needed for the central production of the needed MC samples. The samples of interest will use the new custom evt_0.1KLlifetime.pdl, while all other MC samples will use evt_2020.pdl. 

IF any additional information is required to merge this PR, please let me know and it will be addressed.

Thanks and kind regards, 
Rishabh 
On behalf of BPH
title: BPH new pdl file with reduced KL lifetime by a factor of 0.1
